question: What is the Attendance Management System?
answer: It is an online platform that helps schools and colleges record, monitor, and analyze student attendance. It supports multiple roles like Admin, Teacher, Student, and Parent, and offers features like manual and QR-based attendance, parent notifications, dashboards, and chat communication.

question: Who can use the system?
answer: The platform is designed for educational institutions and supports four types of users: Admins manage the institution setup; Teachers manage attendance and classes; Students mark their attendance and view records; and Parents can monitor their child attendance and communicate with teachers.

question: How do I register as a student or teacher?
answer: To register, you will need a PIN provided by your institution Admin. Go to the registration page, enter your email, select your role, provide the PIN, and verify your email with the OTP sent to you. Once submitted, your account will be reviewed for approval.

question: What is a PIN and why do I need it to register?
answer: A PIN is a unique code generated by your Admin. It ensures that only authorized users can register under your institution. You must enter a valid PIN during registration.

question: What is an OTP and how is it used?
answer: OTP stands for One-Time Password. It's a 6-digit code sent to your email to verify your identity during registration or password reset. You must enter it correctly to proceed.

question: How do I log in to the system?
answer: Go to the login page and enter your registered email and password. Once your account is approved, you will be redirected to your role-specific dashboard after a successful login.

question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and you will receive an OTP. After verifying the OTP, you will be able to create a new password.

question: What can I do as a student?
answer: Students can mark their attendance (via QR code or biometric simulation), view their attendance records, update parent contact details, receive notifications, and chat with teachers.

question: How do I mark my attendance as a student?
answer: You can mark your attendance by scanning a QR code shown by your teacher or by using the biometric simulation page. Make sure you are logged in and use the feature under your dashboard.

question: What is biometric attendance?
answer: It a simulated page that mimics biometric scanning. While not connected to real hardware, it allows students to check in by clicking a button. It records attendance as 'biometric' in the system.

question: What is QR code attendance and how does it work?
answer: Teachers generate a QR code for a class session. Students scan this using their dashboard's 'Scan QR' feature. Each QR code is time-limited to prevent misuse.

question: How can I view my attendance history?
answer: Log in as a student and go to the 'Attendance Records' section from your dashboard. You can view your attendance status by date and subject.

question: How do I update my profile or personal information?
answer: Click on your profile, then select 'Edit Profile'. You can update your name, email, class, stream, and password from there.

question: What is my role as a parent?
answer: As a parent, you can log in to view your child attendance history, receive updates or alerts, and chat with teachers for feedback or communication.

question: How do I get a parent login?
answer: Parent accounts are automatically created when a student enters their parent contact details. Credentials are sent by the system once verified by a teacher or admin.

question: How do I see my child attendance as a parent?
answer: After logging in, your dashboard will show a summary of your child attendance, including charts and recent attendance records.

question: How can I chat with teachers as a parent?
answer: Log in and go to the 'Chat' section. You can search for your child's teachers and send them messages in real-time.

question: What can I do as a teacher?
answer: Teachers can assign classes, mark attendance (manual, QR, or biometric), approve student registrations, send parent notifications, and view attendance analytics for their classes.

question: How do I assign classes or subjects as a teacher?
answer: Go to 'Assign Classes' from your dashboard, select the classes and subjects you teach, and save. You will only be able to manage students in those classes.

question: How do I mark attendance for my class?
answer: Go to the 'Attendance' section. You can either mark students manually using checkboxes or generate a QR code for the class session. Both methods save the attendance automatically.

question: How do I generate a QR code for attendance?
answer: In the 'Generate QR' section, select your class and subject. The system will create a QR code valid for a limited time. Show this QR on your screen for students to scan.

question: Can I see which students have not submitted parent contact info?
answer: Yes. Under 'Parent Status', you can view which students are missing parent contact information and send reminders via email or WhatsApp.

question: How do I chat with a student or parent?
answer: Open the 'Chat' section from your dashboard, select the student or parent, and begin messaging. All chats are saved and visible only to the two parties.

question: What can I do as an admin?
answer: Admins manage institution details, approve users, generate PINs, promote students, view analytics, and oversee teacher/student assignments.

question: How do I approve pending registrations?
answer: From the admin dashboard, click on 'Pending Approvals'. Review the user details and click 'Approve' or 'Reject' as needed.

question: How do I promote students to the next class?
answer: Go to 'Promotions', select the students you want to promote, choose their next class/stream, and confirm. Promotion history is also saved for reference.

question: How do I generate PINs for registration?
answer: In the 'Generate PINs' section, choose the user role (Student or Teacher) and how many PINs to create. The system will generate and list them for distribution.

question: What kind of analytics are available?
answer: Admins and teachers can view attendance trends, subject-wise performance, and identify at-risk students. These insights are visualized using charts and graphs.

question: How does the system detect at-risk students?
answer: The system uses AI to analyze attendance patterns. If a student predicted attendance falls below a threshold, they are flagged as 'at risk' on the dashboard.

question: How secure is my data?
answer: Your data is stored securely. Passwords are hashed, sessions are protected, and OTPs are used for verification. Only authorized users can access sensitive data.

question: Can I use the system on my mobile device?
answer: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works well on smartphones and tablets using any modern web browser.

question: What should I do if my QR code scan fails?
answer: Make sure the QR code is still valid (not expired) and you are logged into your account. Try refreshing the page or ask your teacher to regenerate the QR.

question: What if I entered the wrong OTP or did not receive it?
answer: Check your spam or junk folder. If you still do not receive it, try resending the OTP. Make sure your email address is correct.

question: How will I know if my registration is approved?
answer: You will receive an email or system notification once your account is approved. After that, you can log in and start using the platform.

question: Can I change my role after registration?
answer: No, roles are assigned during registration and verified by Admins. If you need to change your role, contact your institution Admin for assistance.

question: How can I contact support if I have issues?
answer: If you face issues, first check the FAQ or contact your school Admin. You can also use the 'Contact Us' page to send a message to the support team.

question: I registered but I can't log in. What should I do?
answer: Make sure your account has been approved by your teacher or admin. If you see a 'pending approval' message, you will need to wait until it's approved. If you're still having trouble, double-check your email and password, or try resetting your password.

question: I never received the OTP email. What can I do?
answer: Please check your spam or junk folder. If it not there, make sure you entered the correct email address and try resending the OTP. Still having issues? Contact your school admin to check if your email is correct in the system.

question: What if I lost or forgot my PIN code before registering?
answer: If you have not registered yet and lost your PIN, you will need to contact your school or institution Admin. They can provide a new PIN or resend the existing one.

question: Can I register without a PIN?
answer: No. For students and teachers, a valid PIN is required to register under your institution. Admins can register without a PIN, but all others need one to join.

question: Why does it say 'invalid credentials' when I try to log in?
answer: This message means either your email or password is incorrect, or your account has not been approved yet. Double-check your login details and make sure your account is active.

question: I marked my attendance but it doesn't show up. What happened?
answer: Attendance may not be recorded if the QR code expired, the biometric session failed, or if there was a connection issue. Please check again or ask your teacher to confirm your attendance manually.

question: Can I access the platform from any browser?
answer: Yes, the platform works on all modern browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For best experience, use the latest version of your browser.

question: Is the platform mobile-friendly?
answer: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works well on mobile phones and tablets. You can access all major features, including scanning QR codes, viewing attendance, and chatting.

question: How do I log out of my account?
answer: Click on your name or profile icon in the top-right corner of the page, then select 'Logout'. Always log out if you're using a shared or public device.

question: I am a new institution. How do we get started with this platform?
answer: First, create an Admin account. Once logged in, set up your institution details, generate PINs for students and teachers, and configure classes, streams, and subjects. You can then start approving users and managing attendance.

question: Can I use this platform for college-level attendance?
answer: Yes! The system supports both school and college environments. You can set up degrees, semesters, and streams, and assign teachers and students accordingly.

question: How do I know when my child misses a class?
answer: You will receive an email or WhatsApp notification if your child has low attendance or misses a class. Make sure your contact info is up to date in the system.

question: Can multiple parents view the same student's attendance?
answer: Currently, one parent account is created per student using the contact details submitted. If you would like to add another parent or guardian, ask your child to update the contact info in their dashboard.

question: Is there a way to contact support if FAQs do not help?
answer: Yes. You can use the 'Contact Us' page to send a message to the support team, or ask your school Admin for assistance. Some versions of the system also include a chatbot for quick help.

question: Does the platform store or share any personal data?
answer: No personal data is shared with third parties. All data is securely stored and used only for educational purposes within your institution. Your privacy and security are a top priority.

question: How do I know if a QR code session is still active?
answer: If you try to scan a QR code and receive an error, the session may have expired. QR codes are only valid for a limited time. Ask your teacher to generate a new one if needed.

question: Why am I not receiving WhatsApp alerts as a parent?
answer: Make sure your phone number is entered correctly and includes the country code. Also, verify that WhatsApp is installed and active on your device. If you're still not receiving messages, contact your teacher or school Admin to check your contact settings.

question: Can teachers edit or correct attendance later?
answer: Yes. Teachers can update or correct attendance records for their classes if needed. If you notice an error, inform your teacher as soon as possible.

question: What does 'at-risk student' mean in the analytics?
answer: It means the system has detected that the student attendance trend is declining and might fall below the required level. Teachers and parents are alerted so they can take action early.

question: Can I be logged in on multiple devices at once?
answer: For security reasons, it recommended to use one device at a time. If you log in from a new device, the previous session may be logged out automatically.

question: What should I do if I forgot both my PIN and the OTP email?
answer: If you have lost your PIN and did not receive the OTP, contact your institution's Admin. They can resend the PIN and make sure your email is correct so you can receive a new OTP.

question: A student was marked absent by mistake. How can it be corrected?
answer: Teachers can update attendance records after the fact. If you're a student and notice an error, kindly inform your teacher so they can review and correct it.

question: The QR code wo not scan on my device. What should I try?
answer: Make sure your camera is working and your screen is clean. Try adjusting the distance or lighting. If it still does not work, notify your teacher—they can mark your attendance manually if needed.

question: Can parents use the platform on a mobile phone?
answer: Yes, the platform is mobile-friendly. Parents can log in through any modern mobile browser to view attendance, receive updates, and chat with teachers.

question: Is there a time limit for how long I can stay logged in?
answer: Yes, for security reasons, the system will log you out after a period of inactivity. Make sure to save any unsent messages or forms before stepping away from your device.

question: Do I need an internet connection for biometric attendance?
answer: Yes, even though the biometric feature is simulated, it still requires an internet connection to record your attendance in the system.

question: Can I view attendance data from previous terms or years?
answer: Yes, you can view older attendance records from your dashboard. Use the date filter or term selection tools to access past data.

question: Can I resend a parent invitation or login link?
answer: If a parent did not receive their login details, the teacher or admin can verify the parent contact info and resend the invitation or credentials.

question: Can an admin delete a chat message or conversation?
answer: No, chats are private and only visible to the users involved. Admins cannot delete or view chat messages for privacy reasons.

question: What should I do if my camera does not work for QR scanning?
answer: You can try using a different device or ask your teacher to mark your attendance manually. Some devices may also allow you to upload a screenshot of the QR if supported.

question: Why is my account still pending approval?
answer: After registration, your account must be approved by a teacher or admin. If it been a while, reach out to your teacher or school to remind them to review your request.

question: Can I register two students under the same parent contact info?
answer: Yes, the same parent contact (email and phone) can be used for multiple students. Each child attendance will be visible from the parent dashboard.

question: Can teachers see which students scanned the QR code?
answer: Yes, teachers can view a list of students who successfully scanned the QR code and were marked present for that session.

question: How do I know if my attendance was recorded successfully?
answer: After scanning a QR code or using biometric attendance, you will see a confirmation message. You can also check your attendance records to confirm.

question: Can parents receive attendance alerts by email instead of WhatsApp?
answer: Yes, the system supports both email and WhatsApp alerts. If one is not working, make sure your contact details are correct and notify the teacher if needed.

question: What happens if I accidentally close the QR scanner before scanning?
answer: No problem—you can reopen the scanner from your dashboard and try again, as long as the QR code is still active.

question: What should I do if I registered with the wrong role?
answer: If you registered with the wrong role (e.g., student instead of teacher), contact your institution Admin. They may ask you to register again with the correct role and a valid PIN.

question: Why ca not I send messages to some users in chat?
answer: You can only chat with users who are part of your institution and relevant to your role. For example, students can chat with assigned teachers, and parents can chat with their child teachers.

question: Can students or parents delete their accounts?
answer: No, users cannot delete their own accounts. If you no longer need access, contact your school Admin and they can deactivate your account if needed.

question: What the best way to get help if I am stuck?
answer: First, check the FAQs. If you still need help, use the 'Contact Us' form or speak to your school Admin. The built-in chatbot can also answer common questions instantly.
